content: काल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ली|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Black, of a dark or dark-blue colour. {@--2@} Injuring, hurting. --लः {@--1@} The black or dark-blue colour. {@--2@} Time (in general); विलंबितफलैः कालं निनाय स मनोरथैः <ls>R. 1. 33</ls>; तस्मिन्काले at that time; काव्यशास्त्रविनोदेन कालो गच्छति धीमतां <ls>H. 1.</ls> the wise pass their time &c. {@--3@} Fit or opportune time (to do a thing), proper time or occasion; (with <ab>gen.</ab>, <ab>loc.</ab>, <ab>dat.</ab>, or <ab>inf.</ab>); <ls>R. 3. 12</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 6</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 69</ls>; पर्जन्यः कालवर्षी <ls>Mk. 10. 60.</ls> {@--4@} A period or portion of time (as the hours or watches of a day); षष्ठे काले दिवसस्य <ls>V. 2. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 153.</ls> {@--5@} The weather. {@--6@} Time considered as one of the nine {%dravyas%} by the Vaiśeṣikas. {@--7@} The Supreme spirit regarded as the destroyer of the universe, being a personification of the destructive principle; कालः काल्या भुवनफलके क्रडिति प्राणिशारैः <ls>Bh. 3. 39.</ls> {@--8@} ({%a%}) Yama, the god of death; कः कालस्य न गोचरांतरगतः <ls>Pt. 1. 146.</ls> ({%b%}) Death, time of death. {@--9@} Fate, destiny. {@--10@} The black part of the eye. {@--11@} The (Indian) cuckoo. {@--12@} The planet Saturn. {@--13@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--14@} A measure of time (in music or prosody). {@--15@} A person who distils and sells spirituous liquor. {@--16@} A section, or part {@--17@} A red kind of plumbago. {@--18@} Resin, pitch {@--19@} <ab>N.</ab> of an enemy of Śiva. {@--20@} (with the Jainas) One of the nine treasures. {@--21@} A mystical name for the letter म्. --ला {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of several plants. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a daughter of Dakṣa. {@--3@} An epithet of Durgā. --ली {@--1@} Blackness. {@--2@} Ink, black ink. {@--3@} An epithet of Pārvatī, Śiva's wife. {@--4@} A row of black clouds. {@--5@} A woman with a dark complexion. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Satyavatī, mother of Vyāsa. {@--7@} Night. {@--8@} Censure, blame. {@--9@} One of the seven tongues of Fire. {@--10@} A form of Durgā; कालीतनयः a buffalo. {@--11@} One of the Mātṛs or divine mothers. {@--12@} <ab>N.</ab> of a wife of Bhīma. {@--13@} A sister of Yama. {@--14@} A kind of learning (महाविड्या). {@--15@} A small shrub used as a purgative. --लं {@--1@} Iron. {@--2@} A kind of perfume.
